excerpt: "If Roblox Corp’s latest buyout is anything to go by, the billion-dollar social game sensation Roblox may eventually get native voice and video chat at some point. Roblox Corp today acquired Guilded, an interactivity platform designed to connect gamers with various options like voice and video chatting."
